sqlMap.select:
select t1.ipgumdate, t1.IPGUMID, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '009' and dcode = t1.ipgumgubun) as ipgumgubun, t1.IPGUMPERSON, t1.ipgumamt, (select sum(sugumamt) from sa_ipgumdtl where ipgumid = t1.ipgumid) as sumsugumamt, (t1.ipgumamt - (select sum(sugumamt) from sa_ipgumdtl where ipgumid = t1.ipgumid)) as jangumamt from sa_ipgummst t1 where 1=1
AND t1.ipgumdate BETWEEN #S_IPGUMDATE_FR# AND #S_IPGUMDATE_TO#
AND t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND t1.salercd = #S_SALERCD#
AND t1.ipgumgubun = #S_IPGUMGUBUN#
AND t1.ipgumperson LIKE '%#S_IPGUMPERSON#%'
AND t1.ipgumamt LIKE '%#S_IPGUMAMT#%'
order by t1.ipgumdate asc

select t1.seq, t2.saledate, t2.saleid, t2.conname, t2.conm2, t2.conpy, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '009' and dcode = (select DepositGubun from sa_ipgumscheduletb where saleid = t1.saleid)) as DepositGubun, t1.sugumamt, (select kname from hr_insamst where insacode = (select salercd from sa_salemst where saleid = t1.saleid)) as kname, (select address from mm_buymst where buyid = (select buyid from sa_salemst where saleid = t1.saleid)) as address from sa_ipgumdtl t1, sa_salemst t2 where 1=1
AND t1.ipgumid = #IPGUMID#
and t1.saleid = t2.saleid order by t1.seq asc
